General.Name: Changzhou Xingyu Automotive Lighting Systems Co Ltd
General.Description: Changzhou Xingyu Automotive Lighting Systems Co.,Ltd. engages in the research and development, manufacture, and sale of automotive lamps in China. It develops and offers digital lighting, interior RGB ambient lighting, foled lighting technology, and front and rear lamp controller. The company was founded in 1993 and is based in Changzhou, China.

1.Name: Mr. Shu Jun Li
1.Title: CFO, Deputy GM & Sec. of the Board of Directors
